extendedInfo.description: Locates registered sex offenders and sexual predators anywhere in the US. *** Covers all 50 US states plus Puerto Rico ***â Provides a photo, detailed offender records, birth date, physical profile, etc. for each offender.â The database is updated daily!â Search offenders by: - Your current location - Any point on the map - Any address, city or zip - Offender nameâ The only application on the market that allows to search offenders by name!â No registration needed- download and go.â There are no monthly or other hidden fees.â Interactive map updates as you drag from location to location.â Provides the most accurate data.â The list view contains the offenders pictures as well. You can quickly scroll through them and pick the one you want to see more details for.â Tablet optimized for all screen sizesâ Supports "Move to SD card".Our world can be a dangerous place. Knowledge and awareness are our first line of defense.Are you moving to a new area? Are you buying/renting a new house? Will you be living close to any of those dangerous individuals? Are your children visiting a relative or a friend? Will they be safe?Just activate your phone's GPS and locate registered sex offenders in the area around you. You can also search by city, zip code or an actual address.Offenders will be displayed on an interactive map on your device. You will be able to navigate around and click on any of the locations to see the picture, name, address, and offenses of any individual you select.Currently SOS only contains registered sex offenders located in the United States. Our database is updated once a day with new information as it becomes available.-------------------*Featured on the Today Show, NBC October 29th.*Featured on the Daily BUZZ TV Show, March 18th: "This is the app you need to know about to protect your children"Other TV reviews for SOS:ABC - WFTV Orlando Sep 24, 2009NBC - WVLA Baton Rouge Oct 2, 2009FOX - KTVI St. Louis Feb 2, 2010FOX - WITI Milwaukee Mar 3, 2010ABC - KITV Honolulu Mar 2, 2010ABC - WGGB Springfield Mar 4, 2010-------------------

reviews.title: Galaxy Note 2
reviews.comment: Apparently this app doesn\'t work on my phone only?  Idk.. but it never loads the cities I search for.  Only the \"near me\" section works.  Found a much better app for free, thankfully.
reviews.author: Chass Gibson

reviews.title: Never Without
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this app for so long now, it\'s always been a wonderful, useful app to have on my phone for my son and myself, better safe then sorry. Its amazing how much work theyve put into it, the changes have been well appreciated! 5 STAR APP ALL THE WAY!! Great job!!
reviews.author: Angela Kingston

reviews.title: Awesome times a million
reviews.comment: I must say its a must have if you have a young daughter or son to protect against the crimes committed its so shocking to see the real side of life and to know a person who you knew for so long to turn out to be... Thank you for making a grate app good job guys thumbs up
reviews.author: mohsin Begg

reviews.title: Accurate
reviews.comment: Did you know that sex offenders are people that you know. They earn your trust to get to you or your children.    I live in an apartment & I check this app very frequently.  Its always accurate. Unfortunately, it shows me a sex offender close by. But because this app is accurate I was able to tell my neighbor that her new moved in boyfriend is a register offender.  Thank you!
reviews.author: Darcy Cornell

reviews.title: Chicken pox
reviews.comment: This app rocks.  It is nasty to see how many sex offenders there are within such close parameters. This app is descriptive and very informative.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One star fo now
reviews.comment: All it says is google lookup map unavailable.  Check connection. Tried 4g and wifi and no luck.
reviews.author: mark demarcantonio

reviews.comment: Great app!! If u have kids!
reviews.author: Shannon Groseclose

reviews.title: One sex offender missing
reviews.comment: This app is great BUT the only problem is I know someone who is a registered sex offender but you do not have him on here. Please fix his name is Shane Bates and he lives in Cheyenne Wyoming on the weekdays and in Mills Wyo on weekends.
reviews.author: robert grant

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Very useful and helps to being alert to your surroundings especially when you have children around
reviews.author: Glenn Howell

reviews.title: Made corrections timely
reviews.comment: Notified them they were missing several and app was corrected within a few days, overall I would rate it good and definitely worth loading, still best to check state police website.
reviews.author: Alan Edwards

reviews.comment: Nice to know where all the offenders are
reviews.author: Tiffany Frunzi

reviews.title: Pictures!
reviews.comment: Well after restarting my phone, the pictures are showing up! Thank goodness cause my son is my number one and we try to get out as much as we can.which involves being around other people!
reviews.author: Krissy Tressler

reviews.title: A must have
reviews.comment: As soon as i got the app i Found an old neighbor of mine he had moved out a few weeks b4 and I found a friend of my kids dad scary I found my old neighbor using another zipcode
reviews.author: gloria sule

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Best app of its kind on Play store. Works flawlessly anywhere I\'ve traveled. I don\'t know if I feel any safer using it or not, but it\'s an excellent tool to have. I highly this app.
reviews.author: John Peterson

reviews.title: Fraud!
reviews.comment: Out of date 5 years I know one guy was his home but has been away 5 years after he was found to be a serial killer!
reviews.author: Billy Lovell

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: As a Federal Law Enforcement Officer, we have at our disposal many different ways of searching for people and sexual offenders.  I am a father of 3 young kids myself so I toe the line between being paranoid and prepaid. Out of all the programs I have used, I have this app on my phone as well as all my familes. This app is well worth the $1.99 and I would recommend it to anyone.
reviews.author: brian davis

reviews.title: JusticeInTheFace
reviews.comment: With this app people will be more well informed and be more cautious of their surroundings. Cant see why no one should have this.
reviews.author: T.J. Michael

reviews.title: Fn kool
reviews.comment: Only thing bad is how many cho-moe chumps are in every hood i feel the need to check...
reviews.author: Richard Kyrtz

reviews.title: screwed up
reviews.comment: the pictures will not load,what the hell did I pay for this app if it doesn\'t work properly?! I want a refund! >:(
reviews.author: Esmey Paredes

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Worth ur money!  Best I\'ve seen yet. Its up to date and has info and pic of each person and also has other locations of where the person lives or has lived in the past. Very good and easy-to-use.
reviews.author: Rachelle Beasley
